action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> open cupboard
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
> go to pantry
Turn 2
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> open refrigerator
Turn 3
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a peach, a sandwich, a orange and a banana.

> take apple
> take peach
> go to kitchen
Turn 4
You take the apple. In your inventory you have a apple.

> take peach
> go to kitchen
Turn 5
You take the peach. In your inventory you have a apple and a peach.

> go to kitchen
> put apple on counter
> put peach on counter
> go to hallway
Turn 6
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> go to hallway
Turn 7
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
> go to living room
Turn 8
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> take book
> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> put book on counter
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> take mop
> go to kitchen
> put mop on counter
> go to hallway
> go to living room
> put book on table
> go to kitchen
> put plate on counter
> put plate on table
> put mop on table
> done
